short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A DevTools extension for inspecting storyline courses

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your eLearning course development with Storyline Course Inspector, a powerful DevTools extension designed for Articulate Storyline developers.
Created by the team at ReviewMyElearning.com, this Storyline Course Inspector Developer Extension enables you to:
 • Instantly view and edit all course variables
 • Easily navigate to any slide in your course
 • Unlock restricted slide navigation
 • View all [data-model-id]s on the slide. Simply click on any element to copy its ID to your clipboard
 • Highlight correct answers on quiz questions
 • Set passing score to zero with a single click

Our goal is to help developers create better eLearning courses faster and with fewer headaches. Be sure to check out our full application at ReviewMyElearning.com to streamline your course development and review process even further!
